physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Admission examination shows dry mucosa with poor dentition, soft abdomen with mild tenderness on very deep epigastric palpation, normoactive bowel sounds, comfortable appearance, and 2+ pulses palpable bilaterally.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Transfer vital signs indicate improvement with temperature 97.9°F, heart rate 60 bpm, blood pressure 185/70 mmHg, respiratory rate 14 breaths/min, and oxygen saturation 100% on RA.
